decks.notes: The focus of this deck is to assemble the Lotus Field combo as quickly and efficiently as possible, utilizing cards like Hidden Strings, Vizier of Tumbling Sands, and Into the Flood Maw to generate mana and untap Lotus Field. Once the combo is assembled, the deck aims to chain together extra turn spells like Pore Over the Pages and Dig Through Time to ultimately win the game. The deck also includes cards like Artist's Talent and Bond of Insight for card advantage and graveyard recursion to keep the combo going.

This aggro RDW deck focuses on utilizing cheap and efficient creatures and burn spells to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. With a mix of prowess creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage, alongside direct damage spells like Skewer the Critics and Wizard's Lightning, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance and Kumano Faces Kakkazan provide additional reach and removal options to ensure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing a combination of powerful creatures like Archfiend of the Dross and Bloodtithe Harvester, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, this archetype looks to maintain pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The inclusion of cards like Thoughtseize and Duress helps to further disrupt the opponent's strategy, giving this deck the edge in close matchups. Overall, this deck excels at fast-paced, aggressive gameplay in order to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Lotus Field and various spells to generate a large amount of mana quickly, enabling powerful combo plays. Cards like Hidden Strings and Vizier of Tumbling Sands allow for untapping Lotus Field multiple times in a turn, while Pore Over the Pages and Dig Through Time help to find key combo pieces. The deck also includes some interaction with Lightning Strike and Spikefield Hazard to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the goal is to assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a burst of powerful spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to continually tutor for powerful creatures to control the board and overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes a variety of high-value creatures with different abilities to adapt to different situations. It also includes a selection of lands and spells to support the creature strategy and ensure consistency. The deck aims to create a strong and adaptable board presence that can outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Duress and Thoughtseize. It utilizes powerful cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Archfiend of the Dross to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Heartless Act to control the board. With a mix of creatures, disruption, and removal, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and close out the game before they have a chance to recover.

This UW Control deck focuses on using counterspells, board wipes, and card advantage to control the game and outvalue the opponent. The addition of Kaheera as a companion provides a creature-based win condition and additional synergy with the deck's strategy. The deck also utilizes land destruction, removal, and planeswalkers to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the battlefield. The goal is to stall the game, outdraw the opponent, and eventually win through incremental advantage and efficient threats.
